mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_business (bId, bPwd, bEmail, bOwner, bPhone, bName, bNo, bAddr, bCategory) VALUES (#{bId}, #{bPwd}, #{bEmail}, #{bOwner}, #{bPhone}, #{bName}, #{bNo}, #{bAddr}, #{bCategory})
mapper.select: SELECT bId, bName from tb_business WHERE bId = #{bId} AND bPwd = #{bPwd}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_business SET bPwd = #{bPwd}, bEmail = #{bEmail}, bOwner = #{bOwner}, bPhone = #{bPhone}, bName = #{bName}, bNo = #{bNo}, bAddr = #{bAddr}, bCategory = #{bCategory} WHERE bId = #{bId}
